title: Such residential or commercial development shall be allowed within the permissible FSI of the adjoining Residential or Commercial Zone
clause_text: Such residential or commercial development shall be allowed within the permissible FSI of the adjoining Residential or Commercial Zone. Such provisions for public utilities, amenities shall be considered to be reservations in the DP.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone

source_pdf.text_snippet: Such residential or commercial development shall be allowed within the permissible FSI of the adjoining Residential or Commercial Zone.
